BYPASS/HACK_MUSIC_UNLOCKER/TIP: Allows for custom practice and menu music.
BYPASS/HACK_SLIDER_LIMIT/TIP: Lets sliders be dragged beyond the visible limit.
BYPASS/HACK_TEXT_LENGTH/TIP: Allows for unlimited text length in text inputs.
COSMETIC/HACK_CLASSIC_PARTICLES/TIP: Restores classic mini particles that followed the player.
COSMETIC/HACK_HIDE_PAUSE_BUTTON/TIP: Hides the pause button when the in-game cursor is enabled.
COSMETIC/HACK_HIDE_PAUSE_MENU/TIP: Hides the pause menu, helpful for taking screenshots of levels.
COSMETIC/HACK_NO_DO_NOT_FLIP/TIP: Stops flipping attempt & level complete text.
COSMETIC/HACK_NO_PORTAL_LIGHTNING/TIP: Disables portal lightning from size-changing portals.
COSMETIC/HACK_NO_RESPAWN_FLASH/TIP: Disables the respawn flash & circle effect.
COSMETIC/HACK_NO_TRAIL/TIP: Sets the trail to always off.
COSMETIC/HACK_NO_WAVE_TRAIL/TIP: Disables the hard wave trail, standard trail remains.
COSMETIC/HACK_NO_WAVE_TRAIL_BEHIND/TIP: Disables default player trail behind the wave trail.
COSMETIC/HACK_SOLID_WAVE_TRAIL/TIP: No blending on the wave trail, like the black & white trail.
COSMETIC/HACK_STOP_TRIGGERS_ON_DEATH/TIP: Stops move/rotation triggers on death so you can see what killed you.
COSMETIC/HACK_TRAIL_CUTTING/TIP: Brings back the trail cutting bug.
COSMETIC/HACK_WAVE_TRAIL_FIX/TIP: Fixes the snapping of the wave trail.
COSMETIC/HACK_WAVE_TRAIL_ON_DEATH/TIP: Keeps wave trail visible on death.
COSMETIC/WAVE_PULSE_SIZE/HACK_WAVE_PULSE: Changes the wave pulse size multiplier.
CREATOR: Creator.
CREATOR/HACK_ACCURATE_SAVE/TIP: Object positions are more accurately saved.
CREATOR/HACK_COPY_HACK/TIP: Lets you copy any level, without a password.
CREATOR/HACK_CUSTOM_OBJECT_BYPASS/TIP: Removes the object limit for custom objects & lets you save over 50.
CREATOR/HACK_DEFAULT_SONG_BYPASS/TIP: Lets you use hidden default songs in the editor.
CREATOR/HACK_EDITOR_EXTENSION/TIP: Increases the editor length by a factor of 128.
CREATOR/HACK_FREE_SCROLL/TIP: Allows you to scroll out the editor.
CREATOR/HACK_HIDE_UI/TIP: Hides the editor UI while building.
CREATOR/HACK_LEVEL_EDIT/TIP: Lets you edit any level through the pause menu.
CREATOR/HACK_NO_C_MARK/TIP: Removes the (C) mark when uploading copied levels.
CREATOR/HACK_PLACE_OVER/TIP: Lets you place the same object over itself in the editor.
CREATOR/HACK_SMOOTH_EDITOR_TRAIL/TIP: Makes the playtest line in the editor smoother by updating it every frame instead of at 30fps.
CREATOR/HACK_TOOLBOX_BUTTON_BYPASS/TIP: Allows for more objects in the editor toolbox.
LEVEL/AUTO_DEAFEN/HACK_AUTO_DEAFEN/TIP: Deafens user in Discord after a certain %.
LEVEL/AUTO_MUSIC_SYNC/HACK_AUTO_MUSIC_SY: Corrects music after a desync, only supports single-song and linear levels.
LEVEL/FRAME_STEPPER/HACK_FRAME_STEPPER/T: Allows forwards and backwards stepping frame-by-frame.
LEVEL/HACK_0_PRACTICE_COMPLETE/TIP: Completes a level if you beat it in 1 practice attempt.
LEVEL/HACK_ALL_MODES_PLATFORMER/TIP: Enables all modes in platformer levels.
LEVEL/HACK_AUTO_SONG_DOWNLOAD/TIP: Automatically starts downloading songs when you open the level page.
LEVEL/HACK_COLLECT_COINS_IN_PRACTICE/TIP: Allows for coins & user-coins to be picked up in practice mode. Made by WEGFan.
LEVEL/HACK_CONFIRM_FULL_RESET/TIP: Requires confirmation before fully resetting the level.
LEVEL/HACK_CONFIRM_NORMAL/TIP: Requires confirmation before exiting practice mode.
LEVEL/HACK_CONFIRM_PRACTICE/TIP: Requires confirmation before entering practice mode.
LEVEL/HACK_CONFIRM_RESET/TIP: Requires confirmation before resetting the level.
LEVEL/HACK_FORCE_PLATFORMER/TIP: Enables platformer mode on all levels.
LEVEL/HACK_INSTANT_COMPLETE/TIP: Teleports the player to the end of a level.
LEVEL/HACK_PRACTICE_BUG_FIX/TIP: Saves & restores player velocity in practice mode.
LEVEL/HACK_PRACTICE_MUSIC/TIP: Unlocks the practice music sync settings.
LEVEL/HACK_REPLAY_LAST_CHECKPOINT/TIP: Respawn from your last practice mode checkpoint after completing a level.
LEVEL/HACK_SHOW_HITBOXES_ON_DEATH/TIP: Visualizes level hitboxes, only on death.
LEVEL/HACK_SHOW_LAYOUT/TIP: Removes all decoration and color from levels.
LEVEL/NOCLIP_LIMITS/HACK_NOCLIP_LIMITS/T: Kills the player after certain accuracy thresholds, requires Noclip.
LEVEL/RANDOM_SEED/HACK_RANDOM_SEED/TIP: Makes random triggers consistent across attempts (including practice).
LEVEL/SHOW_HITBOXES_TRAIL/HACK_SHOW_HITB: Shows a trail of where your player hitbox went during an attempt, Show Hitboxes required.
LEVEL/SMART_STARTPOS/HACK_SMART_STARTPOS: Automatically sets gamemode, speed, size & border for a StartPos.
LEVEL/STARTPOS_SWITCHER/HACK_STARTPOS_SW: Lets you switch between multiple start positions in-level.
UNIVERSAL/HACK_ALLOW_LOW_VOLUME/TIP: Removes snapping to 0% when setting volume to 3% or below.
UNIVERSAL/HACK_AUTO_SAFE_MODE/TIP: Enables Safe Mode only when cheats are enabled.
UNIVERSAL/HACK_LOCK_CURSOR/TIP: Locks Cursor to window while playing/editing.
UNIVERSAL/HACK_MAIN_MENU_PLAY/TIP: Take control of gameplay in the main menu.
UNIVERSAL/HACK_SAFE_MODE/TIP: Disables progress, completion & verification of levels.
UNIVERSAL/HACK_SAFE_MODE_POPUP/TIP: Warns before entering a level if cheats are enabled.
UNIVERSAL/PITCH_SHIFTER/HACK_PITCH_SHIFT: Shifts the pitch of background music.
UNIVERSAL/THREAD_PRIORITY/HACK_THREAD_PR: Affects how much CPU time GD gets, can improve performance.
